column1: 12:00|noon|"By noon he had his optimism justified with the discovery of a spring
column2: and the wolverines had brought down a slender-legged animal whose coat was close in shade to the dusky purple of the vegetation. Smaller than a Terran deer
column5: but a ridge of stiffened hair rising in a point some twelve inches above the skull dome. Shann haggled off some ragged steaks while the wolverines feasted in earnest
column6: carefully burying the head afterward."|"Storm Over Warlock"|"Andre Norton"
